import React from "react" import "../../styles/product-card.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { cartActions } from "../../store/shopping-cart/cartSlice" const ProductCard = (props) => { const { id, title, image01, price } = props.item const addToCart = () => { dispatch( cartActions.addItem({ id, title, image01, price }) ) } return (
{title}
${price}
) } export default ProductCard
